title: The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt 16 th DLC New Game Plus Mr DJ
description:
The Witcher 3 : Wild Hunt 16 th DLC NG+ Mr DJ

This is meant for my The Witcher 3 repack : <a href="
https://thepiratebay.vg/torrent/12227669/The_Witcher_3_Wild_Hunt_v1.08_15_DLCs__Extras_repack_Mr_DJ" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://thepiratebay.vg/torrent/12227669/The_Witcher_3_Wild_Hunt_v1.08_15_DLCs__Extras_repack_Mr_DJ</a>

OR 

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt GOG version

NOTE: Game version 1.08.2 (GOG) is required for New Game + DLC to work ....

Install Instructions :

-Disable Antivirus and run setup using run as administrator ...
-Install the add-on in your Witcher 3 directory (Change it manually from the default location in the installer) ...
-Play as usual (avoid launchng it from the installer )....

IF YOU LIKE THE GAME , BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS !

How New Game Plus works :

-Start up The Witcher 3 and load your last saved game. This save needs to be from after the main story's ending. Once you've loaded it up, enter the options menu and save your game. This save file can now be used for your New Game +.

-Quit back to the game's main menu and select 'new game'. From here, select your difficulty level and Witcher 2 save simulation as normal, and then a third option will present itself. When asked if you wish to begin New Game +, select 'ON' and then choose the save file that you wish to use.

And there you have it. It's back to the hunt for us , if your level was below 30 before completing the game , you'll start with level 30 , level above 30 will be retained as it is ....
